Name: Marble Ball Racing
About the game: Marble ball racing is a racing game. Player will control marble ball to race with other 24 AI marble ball. This is a single player game. In case to challenge the player game level can be set at the start scene. To control marble ball you can use arrow key or WASD key on the keyboard. Player will play with 60 unique stages in sci-fi theme.
